plugins:trust:sign.description: pack an npm package and produce a tgz file along with a corresponding digital signature

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

signatureurl.name: signatureurl
signatureurl.description: the url location where the signature will be hosted minus the name of the actual signature file.

publickeyurl.name: publickeyurl
publickeyurl.description: the url where the public key/certificate will be hosted.

privatekeypath.name: privatekeypath
privatekeypath.description: the local file path for the private key.

plugins:trust:verify.description: For an npm validate the associated digital signature if it exits.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

npm.name: npm
npm.description: Specify the npm name. This can include a tag/version

registry.name: registry
registry.description: The registry name. the behavior is the same as npm.
